# meraki_wireless_mqtt_settings (Data Source)

This data source can read the `Wireless MQTT Settings` configuration.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "meraki_wireless_mqtt_settings" "example" {
  organization_id = "123456"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `organization_id` (String) Organization ID

### Read-Only

- `ble_allow_lists_macs` (List of String) Allowed MAC List
- `ble_allow_lists_uuids` (List of String) Allowed UUID List
- `ble_enabled` (Boolean) BLE Enabled
- `ble_flush_frequency` (Number) BLE Flush frequency in seconds. Will be between 1 and 2147483647. Default is 60 seconds
- `ble_hysteresis_enabled` (Boolean) BLE Hysteresis Enabled
- `ble_hysteresis_threshold` (Number) BLE Threshold. Will be between 1 and 2147483647. Default is 1 second
- `ble_type` (String) BLE type of clients to publish telemetry. Valid types are: All, iBeacon, Eddystone, Unknown
- `id` (String) The id of the object
- `mqtt_broker_name` (String) Broker Config Name
- `mqtt_enabled` (Boolean) MQTT Enabled
- `mqtt_message_fields` (List of String) Select fields to populate in MQTT messages. Valid types are: RSSI, AP MAC address, Client MAC address, Timestamp, Radio, Network ID, Beacon type, Raw payload, Client UUID, Client major value, Client minor value, Signal power, Band, Slot ID
- `mqtt_publishing_frequency` (Number) MQTT Publishing Frequency in seconds. Will be between 1 and 2147483647. Default is 1 second
- `mqtt_publishing_qos` (Number) MQTT Publishing QoS. Valid types are: 0, 1, 2
- `mqtt_topic` (String) MQTT Topic
- `network_id` (String) Network ID
- `wifi_allow_lists_macs` (List of String) Allowed MAC List
- `wifi_enabled` (Boolean) Wi-Fi Enabled
- `wifi_flush_frequency` (Number) Wi-Fi Flush frequency in seconds. Will be between 1 and 2147483647. Default is 60 seconds
- `wifi_hysteresis_enabled` (Boolean) Wi-Fi Hysteresis Enabled
- `wifi_hysteresis_threshold` (Number) Wi-Fi Threshold. Will be between 1 and 2147483647. Default is 1 second
- `wifi_type` (String) Wi-Fi client type. Valid types are: Visible, Associated
